EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 50 spell points. Each additional level of Draconic Incarnation after this one grants 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells. +1 Evocation and Conjuration DC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells. +1 Evocation and Conjuration DC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your draconic lineage allows you to periodically enter a fuious spell rage. Activate Arcane Draconic Fury to add 50 to your Spell Power for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds
Passive: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +5% Spell Critical Damage with all Spells. +1 Evocation and Conjuration DC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Sheath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You wreathe yourself in a shield of elemental energy that persists for 2 minutes and grants you 50% absorption to the element. Enemies that strike you take 1d3 + 10 damage of that elemental type and have a small chance to take a powerful blast of 4d20 + 100 damage of that type. Cooldown: 1 minute Cost: 10 spell points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: You wreathe yourself in a shield of elemental Fire that persists for 2 minutes and grants you 50% absorption. Enemies that strike you take 1d3 + 10 Fire damage and have a small chance to take a powerful blast of 4d20 + 100 ire damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: You wreathe yourself in a shield of elemental Cold that persists for 2 minutes and grants you 50% absorption. Enemies that strike you take 1d3 + 10 Cold damage and have a small chance to take a powerful blast of 4d20 + 100 Cold damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: You wreathe yourself in a shield of elemental Acid that persists for 2 minutes and grants you 50% absorption. Enemies that strike you take 1d3 + 10 Acid damage and have a small chance to take a powerful blast of 4d20 + 100 Acid damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: You wreathe yourself in a shield of elemental Electricity that persists for 2 minutes and grants you 50% absorption. Enemies that strike you take 1d3 + 10 Electric damage and have a small chance to take a powerful blast of 4d20 + 100 Electric damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage makes you fearsome to behold, as well as bold and courageous. You gain +[2/4/6] Intimidate, +[2/4/6] to saving throws sersus fear and +[1/2/3] to your DCs on fear-based spells. Rank 3: You are immune to fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonhide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your skin has thickened and become scaly like that of a dragon. You gain +[1/2/3] Natural Armor and +[2/4/6] to your Fortitude saves. Rank 3: You also no longer automatically fail Fortitude saves on a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Perception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage makes your senses keener, allowing you to spot danger and avoid it. You gain +[2/4/6] Spot and +[2/4/6] to your Reflex saves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Go Out With A Bang
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You feign an explosive death: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of elemental energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half. You then trigger a Diplomacy effect and become invisible for the next 10 seconds. This invisibility does not break if you attack enemies or cast spells.

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Go Out With A Bang
DC.Description: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of elemental energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go Out With a Bang: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: You feign an explosive death: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of fire energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half. You then trigger a Diplomacy effect and become invisible for the next 10 seconds. This invisibility does not break if you attack enemies or cast spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go Out With a Bang: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: You feign an explosive death: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of cold energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half. You then trigger a Diplomacy effect and become invisible for the next 10 seconds. This invisibility does not break if you attack enemies or cast spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go Out With a Bang: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: You feign an explosive death: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of acid energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half. You then trigger a Diplomacy effect and become invisible for the next 10 seconds. This invisibility does not break if you attack enemies or cast spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go Out With a Bang: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: You feign an explosive death: Nearby enemies take 1d[8/10/12] + [8/10/12] per caster level damage from a blast of electric energy centered on you. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces damage by half. You then trigger a Diplomacy effect and become invisible for the next 10 seconds. This invisibility does not break if you attack enemies or cast spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Barrier of Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can occasionally make yourself highly resistance to physical damage, much like your draconic ancestors. For the next [30/60/90] seconds, you have [60/90/120] points of ablative protection versus physical damage. Stacks with the effects of other spalles such as Stoneskin and Ablative Armor. Cooldown: 2 minutes Cost: 20 SP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Precise Casting: Conjuration / Evocation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +1 DC to spells of the selected school.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2 Conjuration DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2 Evocation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Daunting Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage allow you to unleash a terrifying roar that causes all nearby to cower in fear. Enemies within the area of effect are subject to a Despair effect and will be paralyzed for 15 seconds. A successful Will save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) negates the effect, though is an enemy makes its save, it is still Shaken unless it is immune to fear effects. Cooldown: 2 minutes

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Daunting Roar
DC.Description: Enemies within the AoE are subject to despair effect and will be paralyzed for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Heritage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a dragon color. The bloof of this dragon type flows through your veins, granting you +[10/20/30] Spell Power with all spells related to that dragon's element per rank.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Heritage: Black
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can trace your line back to black dragons. You gain +[10/20/30] Acid spell power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Heritage: Blue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can trace your line back to blue dragons. You gain +[10/20/30] Electric spell power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Heritage: Red
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can trace your line back to red dragons. You gain +[10/20/30] Fire spell power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Heritage: White
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can trace your line back to white dragons. You gain +[10/20/30] Cold spell power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Piercing Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your spellcasting is pierce enough to breach many magical wardings and defenses, granting you a +[1/2/3] bonus to spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Waves of elemental energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Fire damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 20 SP

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Burst: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: Waves of fire energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Fire damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Burst: Fire
DC.Description: Waves of fire energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Fire damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Burst: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: Waves of cold energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Cold damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Burst: Cold
DC.Description: Waves of cold energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Cold damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Burst: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: Waves of acid energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Acid damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Burst: Acid
DC.Description: Waves of acid energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Acid damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Burst: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: Waves of electric energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Electric damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Burst: Electric
DC.Description: Waves of electric energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Electric damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an energy type not opposed to your dragon heritage. You gain +[10/20] spell power to that element and and +[1/2] caster level and maximum caster level for that element.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Acid Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Acid spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Electric Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Electric spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Fire Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Fire spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Cold Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Cold spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Spell Knowledge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your dragon heritage grants you +1 to your caster level and maximum caster level on spells of your dragon element.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Spell Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds special effects to spells related to of your dragon's element. Fire spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra Light damage Cold spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra Sonic damage Acid spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Fortitude save by 5 for [10/20/30] seconds Electric spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Reflex save by 10 for [10/20/30] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage gives you the ability to soar through a group of enemies, damaging them with the fury of the elements. 2d6 damage of your dragon's energy type per caster level is dealt to any enemies struck during the attack. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half. Each enemy is also knocked down unless it succeeds on a Strength or Dexterity save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier). Cooldown: 1 minute

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Damage)
DC.Description: 2d6 damage of your dragon's energy type per caster level is dealt to any enemies struck during the attack. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Knockdown)
DC.Description: Each enemy is also knocked down unless it succeeds on a Strength or Dexterity save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Like a true dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense elemental energy that deals 1d5 + 15 damage per caster level to enemies within its area of effect. A successful Refelex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Breath Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Add special effects to your breath attacks. 15% chance that target will sleep. 15% chance that target will be slowed for 10 seconds. 15% chance that target will be paralyzed for 4 seconds. 15% chance that target will suffer 2d8 strength damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Vortex
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense elemental energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 elemental damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 2 minutes Cost: 30 SP

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense fire energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Fire damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Fire
DC.Description: Intense fire energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Fire damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense cold energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Cold damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Cold
DC.Description: Intense cold energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Cold damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense acid energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Acid damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Acid
DC.Description: Intense acid energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Acid damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense electric energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Electric damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Electric
DC.Description: Intense electric energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Electric damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Hunger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
The voracity of you draconic ancestors is strong within you. Once per second, when you cast a spell, this is a 5% chance that you will gain an Enhancement Bonus to Temporary HP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds, and a 5% chance that you will gain an Enhancement Bonus of Temporaray SP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds.
If Draconic Fury is active, you also gain a 10% chance that you will gain a Racial Bonus to Temporaray HP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds, and a 10% chance that you will gain a Racial Bonus to Temporary SP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Fearsome Invulnerability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage allows you to occasionally enter a state of frightening imperviousness. For 30 seconds you have DR 100/Epic, Resistance 200 to Fire/Cold/Electricity/Acid, +30 PRR, MRR and MRR Cap, and your hitpoints regenerate at a very swift rate. Cooldown: 4 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma
